room_title: Escape room "Front Street Casino Heist" by The Exit Games in Wilmington
room_description:
You are a member of America’s most successful crime syndicate. Today, you’ll be facing your greatest challenge yet, as you and your team attempt a heist at the Front Street Casino. Your recon team has completed Phase One of the heist (they have temporarily neutralized the security cameras and gained access to the casino owner’s office, where the door to the vault awaits).
They've assessed the situation and have reported that this particular vault is going to be difficult to compromise. Luckily, there are hidden clues, tools, and hints around the office, if you only have the wit to interpret them. If you do manage to enter the vault, you will have to make a crucial decision: take the available money and run, or stay a little longer to try and increase your take!
